text: Pine Run is a tributary to Neshannock Creek in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in south-central Mercer County and flows southeast entering Neshannock Creek south and downstream of Mercer, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 46% agricultural, 45% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Mercer County, Pennsylvania
title: Beaver Run (Neshannock Creek tributary)
